contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 29, 1904 D Scotland vs. Durham and Northumberland Associations Contest (Second Section)
Scotland vs. Durham and Northumberland Associations Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Scotland vs. Durham and Northumberland Associations Contest scotland-vs-durham-and-northumberland-as-5375
None
Waverley Market, Edinburgh 8 bands competed - 4 chosen from the Scottish Amateur Band Association, and 4 from the Durham and Northumberland Assocation.
Sept. 5, 2013, 4:13 p.m. June 7, 2020, 1:09 p.m.
1 Musselburgh & Fisherrow Trades Thomas Moore Memories of Meyerbeer [arr. W. Rimmer]
2 Birtley League of the Cross R. H. Cooper Beethoven's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
3 Broxburn Silver William Kane Memories of Balfe
4 Felling Colliery Silver James Oliver
5 Jarrow Borough J. A. Greenwood
6 Hebburn Temperance George Hawkins
7 Wright Memorial Charlie Wright
8 Shotts Foundry John Radcliffe
